Posts.Content: Apr 16, 2011 06:59PM kaitsmom wrote: Hi Melinda,  I did not have mine done at Duke, but I am in the Raleigh area and just wanted to say I wish you the best.  I remember it being uncomfortable, but they had given me lots of drugs when they did the mapping, so I would say that it was tolerable for me.  What are they planning to give you for pain or to help you relax?
